questions.text: Kara and Mike were out drinking at an alien bar early in the episode.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She wasn't dressed as Supergirl but as Kara. Mike (Mon-El) and Kara both drank some alien booze that was deadly to humans. No one seemed to question who she was.

questions.text: What animal was pulled from the ice after more than 5,000 years?
questions.explanation:
Wolf.

	Researchers studying climate change pulled the wolf out of the ice. It had an ancient arrowhead stuck in it's neck. After about an hour the wolf had returned to room temperature. All but one member of the team was killed off camera by the alien parasite that was inside the wolf's body.

questions.text: Which character came out as a lesbian?
questions.explanation:
Alex.

	Alex started to develop feelings for Maggie several episodes earlier, but Maggie was in a relationship. After a scene in the alien bar where Alex and Maggie spoke, Alex came out as a lesbian to Kara later in the episode. She told Kara that she didn't realize it, but she's had thoughts like that her entire life.

questions.text: Kara's powers were drained by a parasite.
questions.explanation:
True.

	After her first fight with the parasite, she was left weak and in distress. She nearly died while fighting it. The parasite grew stronger each time it touched her.

questions.text: Who designed the super suit that James wore when fighting crime?
questions.explanation:
Winn.

	James and Winn got into an argument about halfway through the episode about how James needed the suit right then. Winn kept insisting that it wasn't ready, but later in the episode he gave it to James, who joined the fight against evil.

questions.text: What job did Mike get after being fired from CatCo.?
questions.explanation:
Mob enforcer.

	He was helping a local bookie collect from aliens who didn't pay their debts. Kara found out about it when she was sent to break up a fight between two aliens fighting in an alley. She and Mike got into a fight over his refusal to be a hero.

questions.text: What name did James Olsen fight under as a superhero?
questions.explanation:
Guardian.

	He chose to put on a suit and fight because he was tired of hiding behind his camera. He told Winn that he knew he wanted to do it from the time he first learned of Clark Kent's secret.

He exploded.

	Supergirl knew that too much power would hurt him. Before fighting him the last time she took plutonium out of the local power plant and then smashed that into his hands as he tried to absorb her powers. He took on all of the power in the plutonium and then simply exploded.

questions.text: Did James reveal his identity to Supergirl?
questions.explanation:
No.

	She tried to use her x-ray vision to see who it was, but his suit was lead lined. She asked who he was, and he only responded "a friend", before driving off.

questions.text: Why did Megan not want to give John a blood transfusion?
questions.correct: She wasn't really a green martian
questions.explanation:
She wasn't really a green martian.

	She was a white martian, the sworn enemy of green martians. Both were the last of their kind, but she didn't tell him what she really was. Instead she pretended to be a green martian as well.
